meanings.definition: The evenings of the weekdays, typically Monday through Friday.
meanings.sent1: On weeknights, I enjoy watching my favorite TV show.
meanings.sent2: We usually have family dinner together on weeknights.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to think weeknights are playtime hours!
meanings.sent4: In the world of weeknights, each evening is a chapter of the workweek story.
meanings.sent5: The city streets buzz with activity on bustling weeknights.
